job_tasks.phrase: Architect and implement consumer-facing AI-powered features using Vue.js, Node.js and Typescript
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development and implementation of user-facing features, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify and implement creative approaches to overcome existing large language model (LLM) blind spots and weaknesses.
job_tasks.justification: This task directly relates to working with and improving the capabilities of LLMs, which falls under modeling, specifically generative modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop scalable AI solutions that empower other teams and enhance overall business capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates building and deploying solutions that have broad impact across teams, a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance our data infrastructure, including tools like Snowflake and Looker, to support data-driven products, including data pipelines and insights
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly mentions enhancing data infrastructure, supporting data pipelines and insights, which are key components of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy impactful features that advance business solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the collaborative process of designing and deploying features, a common software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams on AI/ML technologies and practices.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates guiding and mentoring other teams, which requires strong communication and collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly shows the need to continuously learn and adapt to new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams
Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI-powered features, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While there's mention of software development and data infrastructure, the primary focus on LLM blind spots and building AI solutions points towards this profile.
